summary: A version of the mage from the load screens
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to create a character like the Breton Mage shown during the load screen transitions.

This is the result from a little race mixing! Read The Classy Pythons tutorial on how to mix races and with this dont use the race menu unless you read it because she will reset. So if you wanna make your own changes, you will need his tutorial.

She is in the tavern in Riverwood having just arrived from Helgen. All her gear is from that escape. Have not even spoken with anyone yet!

Enjoy!

Mods used (to get same look at screenshots)

Better Females by Bella (with make up version 1, the very subtle, natural look)
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

How to make your own:
Follow the tutorial in The Art of Race Mixing by The Classy Python
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2614
author: Jase180
